sections.general: consultant professional profile to obtain a tax accountant position that offers me the opportunity to actively apply the knowledge and skills developed during my 9-year career in an international company. qualifications microsoft word, outlook, onesource, onenote, corptax, oracle, peoplesoft, cch, bna excel - pivot tables, vlookup
